title: Fix 'Add Product' failure error

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix the 'failed to add product' error that occurs when a weaver clicks the 'Add Product' button on the Catalog Management page. The fix must ensure that submitting the product form successfully calls the backend and persists the new product without error.

quotes: I am now not able to add product. When o click on add product it says failed to add product

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Add Product' and submitting a valid product form does not show a 'failed to add product' error toast or message.
The newly added product appears in the catalog grid after successful submission.
Any backend error response is caught and surfaced with a meaningful error message instead of a generic failure.
The product form closes upon successful submission.

constraints: Do not change the overall product data model unless required to fix the bug.
Do not modify files listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding new product fields or changing the product form UI beyond what is needed to fix the bug.
Changes to customer management or share link functionality.
